title: WORD_TO_BCD (Function)
text:
FUNCTION WORD_TO_BCD : WORD
Converts one WORD in binary code into one WORD in BCD code
Use
BCD_TO_WORD
for the reverse conversion.

rows.Name: WORD_TO_BCD
rows.Comment: Value in BCD code for the inputW

rows.Name: W
rows.Comment: Value in binary code. Valid range: 0..9999
